programming_languages: JSON (AWS Step Functions state machine definitions)
dependencies: Python dev tooling (from ./requirements.txt): pre-commit==3.8.0, PyYAML==6.0.2, virtualenv==20.26.3, cfgv==3.4.0, distlib==0.3.8, filelock==3.15.4, identify==2.6.0, nodeenv==1.9.1, platformdirs==4.2.2
deployment_relevant_files: ./state_machine/Rekognition.json (Step Functions state machine; orchestrates multiple Rekognition sub-state-machines and writes results to S3)
./state_machine/RekognitionDetectLabels.json (Step Functions state machine; calls aws-sdk:rekognition:detectLabels and S3 head/getObjectAttributes)
architectural_resources: AWS Step Functions state machines (orchestration; parent Rekognition.json plus multiple child state machines referenced via ${rekognition_detect_*})
Amazon Rekognition (DetectLabels/DetectFaces/DetectText/DetectModerationLabels/DetectProtectiveEquipment via Step Functions aws-sdk integrations)
Amazon S3 bucket(s) (input images; output JSON written via s3:putObject; also uses s3:headBucket, s3:headObject, s3:getObjectAttributes)
Amazon SQS queue (implied by Rekognition.json expecting events with eventSource == aws:sqs and body containing S3 event records)
IAM roles/policies for Step Functions to call Rekognition, S3, and start nested Step Functions executions (implied by service integrations)
